FORK_BOMB.desc: Make Windows Unresponsive using a .bat Script ( 100% CPU and RAM Usage )

WALLPAPER_PRANK.desc: Takes a screenshot of desktop and saves it as wallpaper)

DISABLE_DEFFENDER.desc: Disables Windows Defender Service on Target Machine

SPEAK.desc: CONVERTS YOUR INPUTED TEXT TO SPEECH

YOUTUBE_FLASH.desc: PLAYS YOUR INPUTED YOUTUBE LINK (By default - RickAstrey Song [PRESS 0 IF U DO NOT HAVE A LINK])

CRAZY_MOUSE.desc: CHANGES THE MOUSE PROPERTIES AND MAKES THE MOUSE LOOK HIGH AFCK
